replies.msg:
CUKC做切入點， 仲入唔到你中路




暫時恭喜一下， 1983年未改國藉法前英國香港出生的英屬港人

【CUKC - Citizens Of United Kingdom n Colonizes 】
各個國家英殖時期跟英國之間的關係就係大家都係同一身份，
CUKC 而1983後將香港的CUKC 強姦成 BDTC 再劣化做BNO
其他的國家從CUKC 直接歸化為BC ***唯獨香港的CUKC 無
當年背景肯定英國同中国臺底傾好左， 你香港人走哂點算

你可以心諗關我L事，你父母有 CUKC可歸化BC
你的血統傳承下一樣有 (還不追問你父母本 BRITISH HONGKONG PASSPORT)

「BREAKING NEWS: New development on BNO re Right of Abode for CUKCs.
The Chair of BNO Community of Hong Kong Watch thanks Steve Double MP for his invaluable support. BNO passport holders who were (Citizens of the UK and Colonies) CUKCs will regain their full rights as CUKCs. Congratulations!

The Chair of BNO Community and Hong Kong Watch co-founder Aileen Calverley would like to thank Steve Double MP for delivering the House of Common petition on behalf of our BNO community, communicating with the Home office constantly and fighting for the extension of rights of BNO. We also thank many Members of Parliament who have been standing with HongKongers in their fight for rights.

To get to know more details about CUKCs, please join BNO Community. https://www.hongkongwatch.org/bno-community 」

https://www.facebook.com/1457138397739962/posts/2510830205704104/

暫時恭喜一下， 1983年未改國藉法前英國香港出生的英屬港人

【CUKC - Citizens Of United Kingdom n Colonizes 】
各個國家英殖時期跟英國之間的關係就係大家都係同一身份，
CUKC 而1983後將香港的CUKC 強姦成 BDTC 再劣化做BNO
其他的國家從CUKC 直接歸化為BC ***唯獨香港的CUKC 無
當年背景肯定英國同中国臺底傾好左， 你香港人走哂點算

你可以心諗關我L事，你父母有 CUKC可歸化BC
你的血統傳承下一樣有 (還不追問你父母本 BRITISH HONGKONG PASSPORT)

「BREAKING NEWS: New development on BNO re Right of Abode for CUKCs.
The Chair of BNO Community of Hong Kong Watch thanks Steve Double MP for his invaluable support. BNO passport holders who were (Citizens of the UK and Colonies) CUKCs will regain their full rights as CUKCs. Congratulations!

The Chair of BNO Community and Hong Kong Watch co-founder Aileen Calverley would like to thank Steve Double MP for delivering the House of Common petition on behalf of our BNO community, communicating with the Home office constantly and fighting for the extension of rights of BNO. We also thank many Members of Parliament who have been standing with HongKongers in their fight for rights.

To get to know more details about CUKCs, please join BNO Community. https://www.hongkongwatch.org/bno-community 」
